name: Hit Bridge
description:
My First Published Game!

Throw rocks to destroy the balloons, aiming to continue on the bridges.

Controls:

  • Move Right;
  • Move Left;
  • Shoot.

Feactures:

  • 2 types of coins;
  • 6 different characters; 
  • 6 different balloons;
  • Gradual difficulty;
  • Google play games ranking.

Credits:

  • Programmer: Nathã V. de Azevedo.
  • Graphs: Guilherme Faccin (Pukahuna); Priscila Albuquerque; Nathã V. de Azevedo.

OBS: has ads.
